properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Nikupe nini au nikushukuru vipi Bwana
unanipenda pendo nisiloweza kueleza
(Yesu erowerne Yesu erowerne
Yesu eromielne Yesu eromielne gikinda
eromielne gikinda.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ichiworinwa nono jawar (Yesu)
Ichiwo rembikanyo maluoko richo
Giringri kachamo jawar tayudo ngima (Kweli Yesu)
Umenipa mwili wako na damu nimekunywa,
Umenipa kwa upendo bila kitu chochote.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Abiro iri romna jawar (Yesu)
Abiro iri kanyo akelo richo
Etiend msalapi ni mondo'ayudi (Yesus wangu)
Nipokee kwako leo, niwe wako daima,
Niongoze maishani popote niendapo.
